DOC.brief_summary: This study will describe the factors influencing the physician in face of elevated blood pressure in already treated patients
DOC.brief_title: Survey to Assess Why People Are Not Responding to Treatment in Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Men or women over 18 Hypertensive patients Uncontrolled hypertension (blood pressure >/=140/90 mmHg on the day of consultation or >/=130/80 mmHg in diabetic patients or in patients suffering from kidney failure, or in elderly patients with a systolic blood pressure >/=150 mmHg (in the absence of orthostatic hypotension) Patients treated with a combination, fixed or not, of ReninAngiotensin System Blocker (RASB) + Hydrochlorothiazide (HCTZ) Patients examined in common medical care practice, whatever the reason for consultation Patients informed of the study
